Max resolution with HPIJS driver ("hpijs-pcl5e"): 600x600 dpi

Adding the following to the PPD file for the "pxlmono" driver enables toner saving and toner density adjustments:

*OpenGroup: Adjustment/Adjustment

*OpenUI *Economode/Toner Saving: PickOne
*FoomaticRIPOption Economode: enum JCL A
*OrderDependency: 160 AnySetup *Economode
*DefaultEconomode: Medium
*Economode Off/Off: "%% FoomaticRIPOptionSetting: Economode=Off"
*FoomaticRIPOptionSetting Economode=Off: "SET ECONOMODE=OFF"
*Economode Medium/Medium: "%% FoomaticRIPOptionSetting: Economode=Medium"
*FoomaticRIPOptionSetting Economode=Medium: "SET ECONOMODE=ON"
*Economode Light/Light: "%% FoomaticRIPOptionSetting: Economode=Light"
*FoomaticRIPOptionSetting Economode=Light: "SET ECONOMODE=LIGHT"
*CloseUI: *Economode

*OpenUI *TonerDensity/Toner Density: PickOne
*FoomaticRIPOption TonerDensity: enum JCL A
*OrderDependency: 100 AnySetup *TonerDensity
*DefaultTonerDensity: Medium
*TonerDensity Light/Light: "%% FoomaticRIPOptionSetting: TonerDensity=Light"
*FoomaticRIPOptionSetting TonerDensity=Light: "SET DENSITY=-2"
*TonerDensity Lighter/Lighter: "%% FoomaticRIPOptionSetting: TonerDensity=Lighter"
*FoomaticRIPOptionSetting TonerDensity=Lighter: "SET DENSITY=-1"
*TonerDensity Medium/Meduim: "%% FoomaticRIPOptionSetting: TonerDensity=Medium"
*FoomaticRIPOptionSetting TonerDensity=Medium: "SET DENSITY=0"
*TonerDensity Darker/Darker: "%% FoomaticRIPOptionSetting: TonerDensity=Darker"
*FoomaticRIPOptionSetting TonerDensity=Darker: "SET DENSITY=1"
*TonerDensity Dark/Dark: "%% FoomaticRIPOptionSetting: TonerDensity=Dark"
*FoomaticRIPOptionSetting TonerDensity=Dark: "SET DENSITY=2"
*CloseUI: *TonerDensity

*CloseGroup: Adjustment

You can also get the appropriately patched PPD here.
